text: My Demon Lover is a 1987 American comedy horror film directed by Charlie Loventhal and written by Leslie Ray. The film stars Scott Valentine, Michele Little, Robert Trebor, Gina Gallego, Alan Fudge, Calvert DeForest and Arnold Johnson. The film was released on April 24, 1987, by New Line Cinema. ==Plot== A homeless street musician becomes a demon when sexually aroused. ==Cast== *Scott Valentine as Kaz *Michele Little as Denny *Robert Trebor as Charles *Gina Gallego as Sonia *Alan Fudge as Phil Janus *Calvert DeForest as Man in Health Food Store *Arnold Johnson as Fixer *Donovan Baker as Burly Cop *Teresa Bowman as Well Dressed Woman in Subway *Dan Patrick Brady as Chip *David S.
